Item.name: Advanced Welding Mask
Item.description: A modified welding mask with integrated HUD elements to keep the user informed about breaches and broken items while protecting the face and eyes from particles when welding.

Item.name: Multitool
Item.description: An incredibly fast and easy to use tool for repairs. No skills required! Just point directly at whatever you want to repair and pull the trigger. Breaks down rapidly from usage. Can be repaired by installing a new fpga circuit.

Item.name: Fixfoam Tank
Item.description: A tank containing a fixfoam solution that can temporarily close off leaks in structures. It will automatically close off new leaks as well for some time. Apply onto structures by using a sprayer and make sure to weld over the fixfoamed area after about 3 minutes!

Item.name: Fire Axe
Item.description: The perfect tool to quickly break down doors in case of ermegency.

Item.name: Halligan-Tool
Item.description: The companion of every firefighter. Opens doors twice as fast compared to a crowbar.

Item.name: CO2 Grenade
Item.description: An efficient tool to quickly put out small fires and drastically reduce big fires by depleting all the oxygen from the room.

Item.name: Firefighter Suit
Item.description: A must-wear for all firefighters. It fully protects you from fires, but it requires regular repairs to do so.

Item.name: Firefighter Helmet
Item.description: A must-wear for all firefighters. It fully protects your head from fires, but it requires regular repairs to do so.
